Lyric:
[00:03.800]How many roads must a man walk down
[00:08.139]Before you call him a man
[00:13.950]How many seas must a white dove sail
[00:18.889]Before she sleeps in the sand
[00:23.889]Yes, 'How many times must the cannon balls fly
[00:29.770]Before they're forever banned
[00:35.140]The answer, my friend, is blowing in the wind
[00:41.000]The answer is blowing in the wind
[00:48.640]
[00:55.210]Yes, 'How many years can a mountain exist
[01:01.560]Before it is washed to the sea
[01:07.120]Yes, 'How many years can some people exist
[01:12.430]Before they're allowed to be free
[01:17.410]Yes, 'How many times can a man turn his head
[01:22.789]And pretend that he just doesn't see
[01:28.600]The answer, my friend, is blowing in the wind
[01:33.850]The answer is blowing in the wind
[01:40.490]
[01:50.010]Yes, 'How many times must a man look up
[01:55.330]Before he can see the sky
[02:00.600]Yes, 'How many ears must one man have
[02:06.390]Before he can hear people cry
[02:12.290]Yes, 'How many deaths will it take
[02:16.290]'Till he knows that too many people have died
[02:23.200]The answer, my friend, is blowing in the wind
[02:28.140]The answer is blowing in the wind
